alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL RAPIDES...NORTH CENTRAL EVANGELINE AND WESTERN AVOYELLES PARISHES THROUGH 845 PM CST... At 800 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elmer to Glenmora. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Marksville, Bunkie, Glenmora, Moreauville, Cheneyville, Effie, Cottonport, Mansura, Lecompte, Hessmer, Evergreen, Plaucheville, Elmer, Poland, Kolin, Ruby, Holloway, and Deville. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 54 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
